greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{i|n, j|n} lcm(i,j).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} d*tau(d^2). Multiplicative with a(p^e) = (p^(e+2) - 3*p^(e+1) + p + 1 + 2*p^(e+2)*e - 2*p^(e+1)*e)/(p-1)^2.
program: (PARI) for (n=1, 1000, d=divisors(n); a=sum(i=1, length(d), numdiv(d[i]^2)*d[i]); write("b064950.txt", n, " ", a)) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Oct 01 2009
return reduce(lambda x,y: x+y, [d*tau(d^2) for d in D])
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Oct 28 2001
